string.s: <size="30">CHAPTER V</size>\n\nTHE GODDESS SLAB
Yes, The plane is about to take off... I can't wait to leave this country and never come back...
I believe it's a dozen hours flight... I'll be home soon...
Okay, Have a good trip...
out...
Sigh... This job is much more tiresome than it seems...
You should try some manual labour, Mister Reeeally tiresome...
Oh... Uuhh... Hi
I didn't expect to see you here... You know how always says to never...
Mister is just a wimp who likes to bark his orders from a safe distance... Don't worry about him...
Yeah... Sure...
Tee hee... I just can't resist... You never noticed, but I like to come here to hear Miss sweet voice on your radio speaker...
There are times I swear I can hear she moaning like... if she's about to have an orgasm... You can't imagine how crazy that drives me...
There are times I hear she talking to you using a higher pich tone... like a highschool girl in love... It's so cute...
You know... Uuuuhh... The radio's low quality codec sometimes makes you think you're hearing voices that are not there and...
DON'T YOU FUCKING DARE TO GASLIGHT ME!!!
I... I'm sorry... That was rude... It's because... anything related to "hearing voices" makes me nervous...
Ooooookay...
Look... Let's forget about our previous... 'harsh' encounter, okay? I loved the gift you gave me...
I... I'm so ungrateful... I should still be thankfull by that wonderful gift you gave me...
I was a little mad because I wanted you so much to find a pair of Miss panties for me... But now I know that would be a difficult task...
Yeah... No problem...
I... I think working here is not doing well to my mental health...
Hey... We all have our quirks, right?
Thank you so much for trying to make me feel better,
But I know some aspects of my behaviour are more than just quirks...
Knowing you have a problem is the first step towards getting better...
....... So, I.... I really have a problem, right....
Sigh... But who can say what 'get better' actually mean?
Come on... Everybody knows crazy girls are the best ones!
I'm... I'm not... 'crazy'... Mister
I know you mean well... But you should know that word is a bit offensive...
Anyways... I can't quit now... Not until, you know... I have a chance to be a little 'closer' to her...
You promised to help me, right?
You promised to help me, right?
Please help me, Mister
I know you are able get her to do naughty things...
If you help me get somehow closer to Miss I swear... I'll help you to put her even more under your leash...
And I already told you how I like to put people on a leash... like... literally...
And I already told you how I like to put people on a leash... like... literally...
Believe me... I can do that...
I... I'll try, okay...
Please try very hard...
See ya...
Yeah... Just another regular day at the Mansion...
I'd better turn off the radio speaker and start using headphones from now on...
Anyways... It's time to run to my bed to get some rest before any other crazy staff member comes looking for me...
_Mister _
_Mister You must wake up... Miss ..._
Huh??
The staff must be gathered for the reception of Miss
Sigh... Okay... Okay... I'm coming...
Jesus Christ... Will he really do this every single time comes back home??
Finally...
Come on... Join us, Mister
Let's get started...
Once again, Miss is coming back from a very stressful mission...
The duty of this staff is to promptly respond to any requests Miss might issue...
You must understand that we need to...
Uuurgh... I can't stand this bullshit anymore...
Excuse me?!? I'm still talking here and...
Yeah, yeah... talk... talk... talk... That's all what you know to do...
Are... Are you out of your mind?
I'M NOT CRAZY!! I'M NOT CRAZY!!
We are just sick of these useless meetings!
You only gather us here to talk bullshit and feed your stupid fetish of bossing people around!!
Miss is my boss... Not you, moron...
So... So many years working here tirelessly...
...always doing the best for the family...
I... I never heard anything so outrageous...
Miss will know about this... and will... will...
There... She arrived... She will save me from you now...
Welcome Miss You arrived at the perfect time to...
Miss
Hey... Nice to see you...
I still can't believe it... I actually recovered an ancient stolen artifact...
I think it's the kind of feat that officially makes you an adventurer...
I know... Right??
See how this is beautiful...
Here...
Check this out... I already knew there's an epic poem written in this slab...
And in my way here I noticed there are unusual marks in some verses...
so if we're able to...
Uhh...
Huh?
You're aware we have a shocked audience here, right?
Oh... I'll talk to Winston and the maid later... I know this is shockingly rude from me but...
That's not the reason they are shocked...
Huh?
You're so excited about showing me the slab that you're not noticing how down here... you keep rubbing your butt over my crotch...
Oh... Lord...
Don't even think about stopping now...
Don't even think about stopping now if you want me to help you with the slab...
But... but...
Come on... Let's show to Winston what his little girl has become...
Please, this is going too far... What Winston will think of me...
You should just admit you became a cock hungry thot lately...
You should just admit you became a cock hungry thot lately,
I... I can't deny this feels good...
Just accept you can't control yourself... and you'll enjoy life like never before...
Oh my God... I can feel you... I can fell...
Hey... I know you missed me... And I missed you too...
Hey... I know you missed me... I missed you too...
Yes, did... I wanted so much to see you again...
See... There's no reason to be ashamed...
Oh, I waited so long to feel your touch again...
What about... uuuuhh...
What about... uuuuhh...
I... I better back off a little...
Damn, See what are you doing to me...
What am I... doing to...
I'm sure you can already feel it, right?
Teehee... There's something hot tickling me back here... Tease operation successful...
Yeah... Looks like teasing and feeling cock rubbing on you skin became your favorite activity...
I want... I want to be with you,
Don't worry, We'll have our time...
You... You're not supposed to do this to me...
Why not? I know you like it...
If your adventures came to this point, it's obviously because you got used be passed around the men in you way...
Do you like this way,
Oh shit... If you keep doing this my pants are going to explode...
What... What are you doing...
You're the one keeping the rithm, Maybe your mind is so confused that you don't even notice how these moves are like reflexes for you...
Oh, I've never been so attached to a man like I am with you...
Urrghh... I'd say something nice now if my pants weren't about to explode,
I... I still need to start deconding the Goddess Slab..
We... We have work to do and...
Miss For the memory of your father... control yourself...
Oh... I'm... I'm sorry, Winston...
Aaww... You're such a party pooper, Winston...
Can I... Can I stop now,
Yeah... That's enough,
Miss I... I tought you had already left behind the... urges... of adolescence...
I appreciate your concerns, Winston... But I'm a grown up now... I can take care of myself...
_Of course, Miss _
Sigh... I... I'd better start concentrating on the work now...
Computers and technology won't help us to decipher the Goddess Slab...
But I have plain old books at the library that will guide the translation of this ancient language...
Would you kindly gather them for me and bring them to my bedroom?
You will allow him in your bedroom, Miss
Winston... Please... What did I just said?
You should know... I had all my greatest insights when translating artifacts while working in my bedroom... It's my one and only supersticion...
Now... I just need a quick nap to recover from the long trip...
Please, While I rest, try to find a couple of books for me at the library...
McGuffin wrote a series about the Andes society that worshipped the Goddess... I'm sure at least one of the books can help with the translation...
When you're ready, bring them to me and we can start to decipher the Goddess Slab!
See you later!
You are the worst thing that ever happened to this house... I'll deeply despise you for the rest of my days...
Well... You can't deny she's definetively a grown up now...
OH MY GOD!! I hate you so much...
I sense a trend picking up traction here...
You totally have her wrapped around your fingers...
I'd said that's a gross overstatement...
Bullshit... It's like she was about to spread her legs for you in this very room...
Now that was rude... She's not like that, you know...
And you really like her... It's so cute...
From what I've been seeing... She will gladly spread her legs to any men who asks the proper way...
Yeah... But I need her do it for a woman too...
She may not do it spontaneously... But she's been losing the willpower to say 'no' lately...
Thanks to manipulative I bet...
I'm not so sure about that...
But I am!
Look... I liked the way you dealt with Winston, but...
Just shut up,
You see... This is it... This is the day...
Uuuhh... The day of what?
I... I can't spend another day on this house... I'm in a state where I might start becoming... violent...
I know because I had a prior similar experience and I don't want to repeat that...
Oooohhh... That would definetively be not cool...
Please... Think about something... My mind needs to satisfy these desires in order to work properly again...
You're going to work on research with her inside her bedroom... If I could at least see her doing something sexy... I would be able to settle for some time...
But if I could even... participate... you'd have the chance to help me change my life for good...
Ok, I'll think about something while I gather her books...
Jesus Christ... I hate grey morals... I don't even know if 'helping' her with that obsession makes me good or evil...
Well... All I can do now is try to find the books asked for... Let's go to the library...
Okay... I need to find books written by Phillip McGuffin... One of them must be able to help in the translation of that slab...
There's a book stand here full of ancient history shit... If I choose wisely, I can put in a good mood...
Should I bring this one or look for others?
She said a couple of books, so I shoud choose another one...
Okay... I have *''* and *''* here... Should I bring these to
I already chose this one...
Ok... I hope these books can do the job... Now I just need to...
Huh!?
A private message notification...
My decription hardware key is down at the computer terminal... I'd better go there check it out...
CHOOSE THIS
LOOK FOR OTHER
GO WITH THESE BOOKS
START AGAIN
The Goddess of the Andes I - Anthropologic Studies
Here it reads 'The Goddess of the Andes I - Anthropologic Studies, by Phillip McGuffin'
'A compendium of archaelogical studies of the ancient Andes society and an extensive analysys of their daily life and political views of their society.'
Seems like an exciting read for nerds, but also a strong somniferous for normal people...
The Goddess of the Andes II - Fertility Worship and Beyond
Here it reads 'The Goddess of the Andes II - Fertility Worship and Beyond, by Phillip McGuffin'
'Everything about the legend of the Fertility Goddess with illustrated essays about the unusual obsession with sexuality of the Andes society.'
The word that caught most of my attention here is 'illustrated'...
The Goddess of the Andes III - Ancient Texts of the Andes
Here it reads 'The Goddess of the Andes III - Ancient Texts of the Andes, by Phillip McGuffin'
'Extensive study about the unique and complex writings of the Andes society that took decades to complete'
Decades studying a language only used in a small village and dead for centuries... Seems exciting...
The Goddess of the Andes IV - Economic System
Here it reads 'The Goddess of the Andes IV - Economic System, by Phillip McGuffin'
'A complete study of the economics and production systems of the ancient Andes society'
It's probably just ancient dudes farming and breeding goats... You don't need a whole book on that, right?
Okay... Let's see what this message is about...
"Mister This is your 'client'.... I hope you're still working on the job I assigned to you..."
"I wonder if Miss has already became more 'open minded' about life and less focused on the artifact hunting business... Just like the way I asked..."
"I have a very generous reward waiting for a job well done... I'll contact you soon..."
Shit... I wonder how this mysterious dude found my private channel... He is either a skilled hacked or paid a lot of money for the information...
Okay... I got the books... Checked my messages... I think I can start working on that damned slab with now...
I think she is already waiting for me in her bedroom...
I wish I could say that line...
But it looks like I need to accept some things the way they are...
Oh... Hello again... I didn't expect such stoicism from you,
It's up to you,
I just hope you can still help me... I'd be VERY grateful if I could be in charge of Miss Just for one night...
Well... Now is definetively the last opportunity to fulfill fantasy...
I could let her at least... watch...
I would only need give her access to the bedroom surveilance camera... It would be kinky, but harmless...
LET HER WATCH THE RESEARCH SESSION
DON'T PROMISE ANYTHING
I'll try, but... I can't promise anything, okay?
Yeah... I... I'll just stay in room then...
See you later, Maybe...
Oh, man... This is kind of sad... But I can't risk have someone 'unstable' like her in my way...
You know... There's camera transmitting a live feed from her bedroom... Would you like to... you know...
OH MY GOD... Really!?!
I remember seeing a camera in her bedroom when I was cleaning up there but I never thought I could actually... actually...
Yeah... You just have to be careful and not let Winston notice that you're here...
Don't worry!! He'll spend the night crying in his room after what Miss said to him...
Okay... I'll open the camera feed for you...
Oh my God... Thank you... Thank you... Thank you...
Now... If I put in the right mood, she could even be willing to try a different experience... 'Ã trois'...
I could to signal for Mia to get in the scene at the right time to make it happen...
However, Mia has this thing about being a dom and 'in charge'... Things could go out of control...
LETTING MIA WATCH IS ENOUGH
MIA CAN COME IN WHEN I GIVE THE SIGNAL
MIA CAN COME IN WHEN I GIVE THE SIGNAL BUT I'LL BE IN CHARGE
I hope watching her is enough to help you with your... condition...
I don't know if it'll be enough... But it will certainly help... Thanks
Aaaand... I don't know how our translation session will unfold up there but...
... if things get really hot and I get the feeling she is in the mood for something different...
... then I'll give you a signal through the camera to come in...
if... if you do this for me... I... I... you...
Hey... That's okay... I'm just feeling a little chaotic good today...
However... There's a condition... I'll be the one on charge up there... And you'll need to hold that domination thing of yours...
But... I never let anyone say what I should do while...
Hey... You trust me, right? Just let me handle the situation... I promess you'll like it...
Oh... I... I guess... If it's you... I... I agree...
You're one of the coolest guys I ever met... I trust you...
Okay, then... I'll lock the terminal in the camera feed... Just press the power button when you leave...
Thank you... Thank you... Thank you...
Well... That's it... Let's go up there and start the research session...
...and also discover if that 'superstition' thing about translations in her bedroom is true or just some bullshit she made up to have me up there...
